title: Populate /ranks with Brotherhood of Copper hierarchy and regulations

requirements.summary: Create a dedicated Ranks page that renders all provided hierarchy and regulation sections with correct headings and bullet lists.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /ranks displays a structured page (not null/blank) containing all provided headings and bullet points in English.
All rank titles and regulation titles appear as clearly differentiated headings/subheadings (e.g., section headers + item headers).
All bullet lists from the user message are rendered as visible lists (not collapsed into paragraphs), including the four Conductor divisions and the three conflict-resolution methods.
No user-provided meaning is altered; text content matches the userâ€™s provided wording aside from removing non-text glyph artifacts (e.g., "?", "??") if needed for clean rendering.

file_operations.description: Implement a new RanksPage component containing the exact text from msg-4, structured into sections for Leadership Ranks, Command Ranks, Specialist Ranks, Initiate Ranks, and Internal Regulations & Culture; ensure each section uses clear headings/subheadings and that every user-provided bullet list is rendered as a visible <ul>/<ol> list (including Conductor divisions and conflict-resolution methods). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for section grouping where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Style the Ranks page to match the existing copper-themed design system while keeping shared layout unchanged and other blank pages untouched.
acceptanceCriteria: The /ranks page uses the existing site chrome (SiteNav + footer) unchanged and presents content within a centered container consistent with other pages (e.g., HomePage container usage).
Content is readable on mobile and desktop (responsive spacing, headings, and lists).
No changes are introduced to /divisions, /lore, or /history page content (they remain blank beyond shared chrome).

file_operations.description: Apply copper-themed, responsive presentation consistent with existing pages: use the established centered container pattern, readable max-width for long-form content, appropriate typography (e.g., Tailwind typography/prose utilities), spacing between sections, and card/section treatments. Ensure no changes to SiteLayout/SiteNav/footer and do not touch other BlankPage routes' content. Use shadcn-ui Card (and related card subcomponents if available) for section treatments. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Wire /ranks to the new Ranks page component while leaving /divisions, /lore, and /history on BlankPage.
acceptanceCriteria: /ranks renders the new Ranks page component.
/divisions, /lore, and /history still render no page-specific content (BlankPage remains null).
Navigation links in the site nav continue to function and route correctly.

file_operations.description: Update TanStack Router configuration to import and render RanksPage for the '/ranks' route instead of BlankPage, while keeping '/divisions', '/lore', and '/history' mapped to BlankPage; ensure route tree remains correctly wired for navigation.
